mapper.select: select m1.id,m1.path,m1.name,m1.icon,m2.id cid,m2.path cPath,m2.name cName,m2.linkUrl from t_user_role ur,t_role r,t_role_menu rm, (SELECT * from t_menu where level=1 and name!='未分配菜单' ORDER BY path) m1, (SELECT * from t_menu where level=2 order by path) m2, (select id from t_user where username=#{username}) u where u.id=ur.user_id and ur.role_id=r.id and r.id=rm.role_id and m1.id=m2.parentMenuId and rm.menu_id=m1.id
SELECT name,id parentMenuId from t_menu where level=1
select count(1) from t_menu where level =1
select count(1) from t_menu where parentMenuId=#{parentMenuId}
select path from t_menu where id=#{parentMenuId}
select m.* from t_menu m,(select id from t_menu where name='未分配菜单') s where level=2 and parentMenuId=s.id
select * from t_menu where level=2 and parentMenuId=#{id}
mapper.update: update t_menu set parentMenuId=#{parentMenuId} where id=#{childrenId}
update t_menu set path=#{path},priority=#{priority} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id from t_menu where parentMenuId=#{id}
select m.* from t_menu m,(select id from t_menu where name='未分配菜单') s where parentMenuId in (#{id},s.id)
